```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

# Set random seed for reproducibility
np.random.seed(42)

# Create a DataFrame with random numbers
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    # Get the head of the DataFrame
    material_head = df.head()
    
    # Create a histogram plot using Altair
    histogram = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
        x='Random Numbers:Q',  # Quantitative encoding for x-axis
        y='count()',            # Count of occurrences for y-axis
    ).properties(
        title='Histogram of Random Numbers'  # Title for the histogram
    )

    # Return a list containing the head and the histogram
    return [material_head, histogram]

# Call the function to preview data (if needed)
result = preview_data(data)
```
